fields.description:
I would expect that "euare-servercertlistbypath" returns a list of server certificates that I have uploaded. However, a ServerCertificateMetadata error is thrown. I'm not sure if this is a tools bug or a euca bug.

{code}
[root@d-31 ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath
euare-servercertlistbypath: error: ServerCertificateMetadata
{code}

A workaround to get some of the information is to use debug with the command to get a list of server certs.
{code}
[root@d-31 ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath --debug
2014-01-29 14:06:14,306 DEBUG   ListServerCertificates parsed arguments: {'userregion': None, 'url': None, 'DelegateAccount': None, 'PathPrefix': None, 'deprecated_delegate': None, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None}
2014-01-29 14:06:14,306 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'iam-url'
2014-01-29 14:06:14,306 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:us-east-1'
2014-01-29 14:06:14,306 INFO    Config option 'iam-url' = 'https://iam.amazonaws.com/'
2014-01-29 14:06:14,306 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'verify-ssl'
2014-01-29 14:06:14,306 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:us-east-1'
2014-01-29 14:06:14,306 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:*'
2014-01-29 14:06:14,307 INFO    Config option 'verify-ssl' = 'true'
2014-01-29 14:06:14,310 INFO    ListServerCertificates parameters: {'Action': 'ListServerCertificates', 'Version': '2010-05-08'}
2014-01-29 14:06:14,310 INFO    Euare sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2014-01-29 14:06:14,311 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.111.1.101:8773\n/services/Euare\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIV07VJWIDPFCLKCKTX&Action=ListServerCertificates&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2014-01-29T22%3A06%3A14Z&Version=2010-05-08'
2014-01-29 14:06:14,311 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: TSm0Mnb3ymKap/wJ6aqcVCv/z0ahRng3QPpq1A34maI=
2014-01-29 14:06:14,311 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data
2014-01-29 14:06:14,319 DEBUG   Euare request method: POST
2014-01-29 14:06:14,319 DEBUG   Euare request url:    http://10.111.1.101:8773/services/Euare
2014-01-29 14:06:14,319 DEBUG   Euare request header: Content-Length: 226
2014-01-29 14:06:14,319 DEBUG   Euare request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
2014-01-29 14:06:14,319 DEBUG   Euare request header: Host: 10.111.1.101:8773
2014-01-29 14:06:14,319 DEBUG   Euare request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.0.2-3-g2b874d3 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-431.3.1.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.1.0 requests/1.1.0
2014-01-29 14:06:14,319 DEBUG   Euare request data:   AWSAccessKeyId: AKIV07VJWIDPFCLKCKTX
2014-01-29 14:06:14,319 DEBUG   Euare request data:   Action: ListServerCertificates
2014-01-29 14:06:14,320 DEBUG   Euare request data:   Signature: TSm0Mnb3ymKap/wJ6aqcVCv/z0ahRng3QPpq1A34maI=
2014-01-29 14:06:14,320 DEBUG   Euare request data:   SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256
2014-01-29 14:06:14,320 DEBUG   Euare request data:   SignatureVersion: 2
2014-01-29 14:06:14,320 DEBUG   Euare request data:   Timestamp: 2014-01-29T22:06:14Z
2014-01-29 14:06:14,320 DEBUG   Euare request data:   Version: 2010-05-08
2014-01-29 14:06:14,415 DEBUG   Euare response time: 0.095 seconds
2014-01-29 14:06:14,415 INFO    Euare response status: 200
2014-01-29 14:06:14,415 DEBUG   Euare response header: content-length: 893
2014-01-29 14:06:14,415 DEBUG   Euare response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
2014-01-29 14:06:14,416 DEBUG   ListServerCertificates -- response content --
<ListServerCertificatesResponse xmlns="https://iam.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-08/"><ListServerCertificatesResult><ServerCertificateMetadataList><member><Path>/</Path><ServerCertificateName>test-cert</ServerCertificateName><ServerCertificateId>ASCLXMUIGZ3CQHZWJK05Q</ServerCertificateId><Arn>arn:aws:iam::876871629845:server-certificate/test-cert</Arn><UploadDate>2014-01-23T21:15:53.437Z</UploadDate></member><member><Path>/</Path><ServerCertificateName>ssl-server-certs-basics</ServerCertificateName><ServerCertificateId>ASCBK8RFOVLE8ESYFPBVU</ServerCertificateId><Arn>arn:aws:iam::876871629845:server-certificate/ssl-server-certs-basics</Arn><UploadDate>2014-01-29T21:52:29.446Z</UploadDate></member></ServerCertificateMetadataList></ListServerCertificatesResult><ResponseMetadata><RequestId>5fe91839-56bd-43f1-a628-572ceca8ac04</RequestId></ResponseMetadata></ListServerCertificatesResponse>
2014-01-29 14:06:14,416 DEBUG   ListServerCertificates -- end of response content --
euare-servercertlistbypath: error: ServerCertificateMetadata
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euare-servercertlistbypath", line 6, in <module>
    euca2ools.commands.euare.listservercertificates.ListServerCertificates.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 289, in run
    cmd.handle_cli_exception(err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 200, in handle_cli_exception
    BaseCommand.handle_cli_exception(self, err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 287, in run
    cmd.print_result(result)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/euare/listservercertificates.py", line 53, in print_result
    print cert['ServerCertificateMetadata']['Arn']
KeyError: 'ServerCertificateMetadata'
{code}

comments.body:
This is fixed in a more recent internal build.

{code}
Running Transaction
  Updating   : euca2ools-3.0.2-0.0.131.20140123gitfd0d10fd.el6.noarch                                                                                                                                   1/2
  Cleanup    : euca2ools-3.0.2-0.0.130.20131220git1dd93815.el6.noarch                                                                                                                                   2/2
  Verifying  : euca2ools-3.0.2-0.0.131.20140123gitfd0d10fd.el6.noarch                                                                                                                                   1/2
  Verifying  : euca2ools-3.0.2-0.0.130.20131220git1dd93815.el6.noarch                                                                                                                                   2/2

Updated:
  euca2ools.noarch 0:3.0.2-0.0.131.20140123gitfd0d10fd.el6

Complete!
[root@d-31 ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath
arn:aws:iam::876871629845:server-certificate/test-cert
arn:aws:iam::876871629845:server-certificate/ssl-server-certs-basics
{code}
